about_the_game:
So Real You Can Taste It!

Embark on a journey through three distinct, beautifully rendered worlds. Each realm in Lollihop is brimming with vibrant colors and lively characters, setting the stage for an immersive and enjoyable experience. Your mission is to navigate these realms, using the unique lollihop to leap, bound, and collect a variety of juicy fruits scattered throughout the levels.

Innovative VR Experience

Lollihop leverages the power of VR to enhance traditional platforming mechanics. The stereoscopic vision offered by VR headsets allows for unparalleled depth perception, enabling you to make more precise and challenging jumps. This innovative use of technology not only enriches the gameplay but also brings a fresh perspective to the platformer genre.

A Sweet, Bite-Sized Adventure

Perfect for those seeking a short yet satisfying gaming experience, Lollihop combines the joy of classic platformers with the innovative features of VR. Whether you're a longtime fan of platforming games or new to VR, Lollihop promises a sweet, diabetes-inducing adventure that's not just a game, but a delightful journey through a world of wonder and excitement.
detailed_description:
VR Headset & Separate Controller Required

The game requires a VR headset and an Xinput gamepad (e.g. an Xbox controller).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, no motion controls required
  • Additional Notes: Requires Xinput gamepad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Jump into the vibrant VR world of Lollihop - a tasty third-person platformer! Guide a playful platypus with a large lollipop through colorful realms, mastering precise jumps and collecting juicy fruits in immersive stereoscopic vision.
